publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7473 Dr Richard Simpson: Ban on Caffeinated Alcohol—That the Parliament notes that the United States Food and Drug Administration has banned pre-mixed caffeinated alcohol drinks; notes that this moves beyond the recent voluntary withdrawal of these by a number of major suppliers and the banning of such drinks in at least four states, and believes that it is now in the interests of public safety that pre-mixed caffeinated alcoholic drinks be withdrawn from sale in Scotland.

S3M-7473 Dr Richard Simpson: Ban on Caffeinated Alcohol—That the Parliament notes that the United States Food and Drug Administration has banned pre-mixed caffeinated alcohol drinks; notes that this moves beyond the recent voluntary withdrawal of these by a number of major suppliers and the banning of such drinks in at least four states, and believes that it is now in the interests of public safety that pre-mixed caffeinated alcoholic drinks be withdrawn from sale in Scotland.
S3M-7473 Ban on Caffeinated Alcohol (lodged on 23 November 2010) Sarah Boyack*

S3M-7473 Ban on Caffeinated Alcohol (lodged on 23 November 2010) Robin Harper*, Jackie Baillie*, Patricia Ferguson*, Bill Butler*, James Kelly*, Andy Kerr*, Patrick Harvie*, Helen Eadie*, Rhona Brankin*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Hugh Henry*, Mary Mulligan*, Karen Gillon*, Marlyn Glen*
S3M-7473 Ban on Caffeinated Alcohol (lodged on 23 November 2010) Trish Godman*, John Park*, George Foulkes*
S3M-7473 Ban on Caffeinated Alcohol (lodged on 23 November 2010) Elaine Smith*
S3M-7473 Ban on Caffeinated Alcohol (lodged on 23 November 2010) Ken Macintosh*, Cathy Peattie*
